loginUrl:
{"ui": [{"name": "userName","type": "text"},{"name": "password","type": "password"}],"url": "https://www.kaixin7days.com/login@{\"telephone\":\"{{telephone}}\",\"password\":\"{{password}}\"}","checkJs": "var a = result\
var c = JSON.parse(result.body())\
if (c.statusCode == 301) {\
    var b = java.ajax(\"https://www.kaixin7days.com/visitorLogin@{}\")\
    c = JSON.parse(b)\
    var accessToken = {\
        Authorization: \"Bearer \" + c.content.accessToken\
    }\
    var header = JSON.stringify(accessToken)\
    java.putCache(\"headers_https://www.kaixin7days.com\", header)\
    a = java.getResponse(\"@Header:\" + header + url)\
}\
a"}
ruleFindUrl:
<js>var header = java.getCache("headers_https://www.kaixin7days.com")
var json = ""
var j = null
if (header != null) {
    json = java.ajax("@Header:" + header + "https://www.kaixin7days.com/book-service/bookMgt/getBookCategroy@{}")
    j = JSON.parse(json)
}
if (j == null || j.statusCode == 301) {
    json = java.ajax("https://www.kaixin7days.com/visitorLogin@{}")
    j = JSON.parse(json)
    var accessToken = {
        Authorization: "Bearer " + j.content.accessToken
    }
    header = JSON.stringify(accessToken)
    java.putCache("headers_https://www.kaixin7days.com", header)
    json = java.ajax("@Header:" + header + "https://www.kaixin7days.com/book-service/bookMgt/getBookCategroy@{}")
    j = JSON.parse(json)
}
var fls = j.content
var fx = ""
for (var i = 0; i < fls.length; i++) {
    fx = fx + fls[i].categoryName + '::/book-service/bookMgt/getAllBookByCategroyId@{"categoryIds": "' + fls[i].associationCategoryIDs + '","pageNum": {{searchPage}},"pageSize": 100}&&'
}
fx</js>
